name: Boomerang Make and Race
description:
Make a Boomerang racer and test your driving skills against classic cartoon characters!

ON YOUR MARKS...PICK YOUR FAVOURITE BOOMERANG CARTOON!
Pick a Boomerang cartoon and create your unique racing car. Choose from Scooby-Doo, Tom and Jerry and Wacky Races.

GET SET…CUSTOMISE YOUR CAR
Decorate your Boomerang racer with wheels, spray paint, stickers and fun accessories.

GO...LET THE RACE BEGIN!
Dodge the obstacles and collect the coins to beat other Boomerang racers to pole position.

KEEP RACING TO GET UPGRADES
Unlock new cars and accessories by winning races and collecting coins!

*******

If you're having any problems with this app, feel free to contact us at apps.emea@turner.com. Tell us about the issues you're running into as well as what device and OS version you're using.
